Name: BR-2 Shotgun
Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Shotgun
Class: Ballistic

Magazine Size: 12
Rate Of Fire: 75 rpm
Effective Range: 15 m

Attachments: Optics (S1), Barrel (S3), Underbarrel (S2)

Originally designed for the military, Behring decided to sell the BR-2 ballistic shotgun to the general public after the initial weapon testers kept requesting to take one home. Featuring a semi-auto fire mode that can rapidly deliver devastating stopping power, the BR-2 is the ideal choice for both offensive and defensive operations.
